name: Witch - A Special Delivery
description:
Play this short but sweet, cute metroidvania style game revolving around a cute witch who just doesn't know what her purpose is in life.  Interact with interesting inhabitants, deliver items and collect new powers - Take on the Monster Lords in an effort to get three Eyes of Newt.

This game was made in a little under 2 months in my spare time - It's my first game and I would love some feedback - There's a few known bugs, but nothing game breaking that I'm aware of - but do let me know if you find anything

Things to note :

The burger is a Joke - I've been getting messages about it. You can't reach it, it doesn't do anything - I'm sorry if that was frustrating.

Controls: Arrow Keys 

Special moves: ZXC and SPACE (though theyre explained in the start menu)

Start Menu : ENTER key

Pause menu: P key

Full screen Toggle: ALT + ENTER (note though the game works just fine in full screen. It doesnt work "perfectly" some text is distorted or put in weird places at times)
